Landing.h2: RelaySMS provides secure encrypted messaging, with protocols such as the Signal Double Ratchet for Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS)

Howitworks.A: You can store tokens to your online platforms using OAuth2 protocols supported by most online platforms. This guarantees only the access you provide is made available for your use at a later time.
Howitworks.B: Without an internet connection compose messages for platforms you have saved from within your RelaySMS app. The messages can be text of any nature which would be encoded and transferred through your default SMS messaging app. All messages sent from your RelaySMS app are encrypted.
Howitworks.C: RelaySMS supports decentralized SMS Gateway clients which can receive and forward SMS messages to online Vault servers. The messages remain encrypted throughout their journey and only the Vault servers can decrypt to publish to your online platforms.

Blog.IDHeader: RelaySMS Expands User Control with Device ID Registration
Blog.IDD: RelaySMS (swob app) introduces a powerful new feature: Device ID Registration with RelaySMS Vault! This innovative approach gives you more control over your offline messaging experience.
Blog.RebrandD: SMSWithoutBorders itself is becoming the umbrella project encompassing RelaySMS and other messaging tools. The core functionality remains the same, but users can expect a new name, enhanced security features, and a focus on future growth under the SMSWithoutBorders project.

FAQ.Q1: Is RelaySMS available on my device?
FAQ.A1: RelaySMS is currently available for Android. We are working on expanding compatibility to other platforms.
FAQ.Q3: How do I send an offline message?
FAQ.A3: Choose the platform you want to send the message to and compose your message within the app. Or click the Help button to find full tutorials on how to send messages through the app.
FAQ.Q4: Are there any limitations on offline messages?
FAQ.A4: There are no limits on the size and number of messages you can send with the app.
FAQ.Q5: I'm having trouble logging in to my account. What should I do?
FAQ.A5: Click the help button to find full tutorials on logging in to your account and if you can't find a solution, you can reach out to our support team at developers@smswithoutborders.com.
FAQ.Q6: I'm experiencing technical difficulties with the app. How can I get help?
FAQ.A6: You can reach out to our support team at developers@smswithoutborders.com or on social media at https://x.com/RelaySMS or by visiting our website.
FAQ.Q7: How do I update the RelaySMS app?
FAQ.A7: The app will usually prompt you to update when a new version is available. You can also manually check for updates through your device's app store.
